product.title: BKIND Hand Balm Mandarin And Grapefruit in Multi
product.body_html: Made from a mix of deeply nourishing ingredients, BKIND hand balm moisturizes, soothes, repairs, and promotes tissue healing. All those powerful natural ingredients come together as a winning formula to keep your hands soft, young and protected. The balm contains mandarin and grapefruit essentials oils for a sweet and fruity scent.
